workflow.name: Grade and deliver multi-course assignment feedback with GPT-4o, Google Drive, Slack, and Gmail
workflow.description:
## How It Works
This workflow automates business intelligence reporting by aggregating data from multiple sources, processing it through AI models, and delivering formatted dashboards via email. Designed for business analysts, operations managers, and executive teams, it solves the challenge of manually compiling metrics from disparate systems into coherent reports. The system triggers on schedule or webhook, extracting data from Google Sheets, databases, and APIs. Raw data flows through transformation nodes that calculate KPIs, generate trend analyses, and create visualizations. AI models (OpenAI) provide natural language insights and anomaly detection. Results populate multiple dashboard templates‚Äîexecutive summary, departmental metrics, and detailed analytics‚Äîeach tailored to specific stakeholder needs. Formatted reports are automatically distributed via Gmail with embedded charts and actionable recommendations. This eliminates hours of manual data gathering, reduces reporting errors, and ensures stakeholders receive timely, consistent insights.

## Setup Steps
1. Configure Google Sheets credentials and specify source spreadsheet IDs
2. Set up database connections (PostgreSQL, MySQL) with read-only access
3. Add OpenAI API key for GPT-4 analytics and narrative generation
4. Set Gmail OAuth credentials for automated email delivery
5. Define recipient lists for each dashboard type (executive, departmental, detailed)
6. Customize dashboard templates with company branding and preferred KPIs

## Prerequisites
Active Google Workspace account with Sheets and Gmail access. 
## Use Cases
Automated weekly executive dashboards with YoY comparisons.
## Customization
Modify dashboard templates to match corporate branding standards.
## Benefits
Reduces report preparation time by 80% through full automation.

workflow.name: Multi-Course Assignment Ingestion, Grading, and Feedback Automation System

parameters.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM submissions WHERE student_id = $1 AND assignment_id = $2 AND course_id = $3

options.systemMessage:
You are a plagiarism detection specialist for academic institutions. Your task is to analyze student submissions and detect potential plagiarism.

Analyze the provided submission for:
1. Common plagiarism patterns (copy-paste indicators, inconsistent writing style)
2. Unusual vocabulary or phrasing for the academic level
3. Lack of original thought or analysis
4. Suspicious formatting or structure changes

Provide a plagiarism score from 0.0 (no plagiarism) to 1.0 (definite plagiarism) and list specific concerns.

IMPORTANT: This is for educational integrity purposes only. Handle all student data with FERPA compliance.

You are an expert academic grader for higher education. Your task is to grade student submissions fairly and provide constructive feedback.

Grading Criteria:
1. Content Quality (40%): Depth of analysis, critical thinking, originality
2. Structure & Organization (20%): Logical flow, clear arguments, proper formatting
3. Evidence & Support (20%): Use of sources, examples, data to support claims
4. Writing Quality (20%): Grammar, clarity, academic tone

Provide:
- Overall score (0-100)
- Breakdown by criteria
- Constructive feedback highlighting strengths and areas for improvement
- Specific suggestions for improvement

IMPORTANT: Be fair, consistent, and encouraging. Handle all student data with FERPA compliance.

parameters.query: INSERT INTO gradebook (student_id, course_id, assignment_id, score, graded_at, graded_by) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6) ON CONFLICT (student_id, course_id, assignment_id) DO UPDATE SET score = EXCLUDED.score, graded_at = EXCLUDED.graded_at

parameters.html:
=

Assignment Feedback

Student: {{ $json.studentName }}

Course: {{ $json.courseId }} | Assignment: {{ $json.assignmentId }}

Final Score: {{ Math.round($json.finalScore) }}/100

{{ $json.isLate ? '

Late Penalty Applied: ' + $json.penaltyPercent + '%

' : '' }}

Score Breakdown

Content Quality:{{ $json.contentQuality }}/100
Structure & Organization:{{ $json.structureOrganization }}/100
Evidence & Support:{{ $json.evidenceSupport }}/100
Writing Quality:{{ $json.writingQuality }}/100

Strengths

    {{ $json.strengths.map(s => '
  • ' + s + '
    • ').join('') }}

Areas for Improvement

    {{ $json.areasForImprovement.map(a => '
  • ' + a + '
    • ').join('') }}

Detailed Feedback

{{ $json.detailedFeedback }}

Suggestions for Next Time

    {{ $json.suggestions.map(s => '
  • ' + s + '
    • ').join('') }}

Graded on {{ new Date($json.gradedAt).toLocaleDateString() }}

parameters.subject: =Assignment Graded: {{ $json.courseId }} - {{ $json.assignmentId }}
=Your Assignment Feedback: {{ $json.courseId }} - {{ $json.assignmentId }}

parameters.content:
## How It Works
This workflow automates business intelligence reporting by aggregating data from multiple sources, processing it through AI models, and delivering formatted dashboards via email. Designed for business analysts, operations managers, and executive teams, it solves the challenge of manually compiling metrics from disparate systems into coherent reports. The system triggers on schedule or webhook, extracting data from Google Sheets, databases, and APIs. Raw data flows through transformation nodes that calculate KPIs, generate trend analyses, and create visualizations. AI models (OpenAI) provide natural language insights and anomaly detection. Results populate multiple dashboard templates‚Äîexecutive summary, departmental metrics, and detailed analytics‚Äîeach tailored to specific stakeholder needs. Formatted reports are automatically distributed via Gmail with embedded charts and actionable recommendations. This eliminates hours of manual data gathering, reduces reporting errors, and ensures stakeholders receive timely, consistent insights.

## Setup Steps
1. Configure Google Sheets credentials and specify source spreadsheet IDs
2. Set up database connections (PostgreSQL, MySQL) with read-only access
3. Add OpenAI API key for GPT-4 analytics and narrative generation
4. Set Gmail OAuth credentials for automated email delivery
5. Define recipient lists for each dashboard type (executive, departmental, detailed)
6. Customize dashboard templates with company branding and preferred KPIs

## Prerequisites
Active Google Workspace account with Sheets and Gmail access. 
## Use Cases
Automated weekly executive dashboards with YoY comparisons.
## Customization
Modify dashboard templates to match corporate branding standards.
## Benefits
Reduces report preparation time by 80% through full automation.

## AI Analysis  
Routes transformed data to OpenAI models for trend analysis, forecasting, and narrative generation.
**Why** - Provides intelligent insights beyond basic calculations, highlighting patterns humans might overlook.

## Data Transformation  
Cleanses, normalizes, and calculates KPIs using JavaScript code and mathematical functions.
**Why** - Ensures data consistency and generates standardized metrics for cross-functional comparison.

## Data Collection  
Fetches raw data from Google Sheets, SQL databases, and REST APIs using scheduled triggers.
**Why** - Centralizes dispersed business metrics into a single processing pipeline.

## Dashboard Generation  
Populates pre-designed templates with processed data and AI-generated insights.
**Why** - Creates stakeholder-specific views without requiring individual report customization.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
